title: In case of such area is occupied by cessed structures and affected by road widening/DP Road, NOC from MHADA shall be insisted
clause_text: In case of such area is occupied by cessed structures and affected by road widening/DP Road, NOC from MHADA shall be insisted.
section: Removal and re-accommodation of tolerated /protected structures falling in the alignment of road: -

source_pdf.text_snippet: In case of such area is occupied by cessed structures and affected by road widening/DP Road, NOC from MHADA shall be insisted.
